title: Ignite Space 2025
description:
Acting as a catalyst for commercial success, Ignite Space conference and exhibition 2025 will create opportunities for you and your business to engage with new customers, collaborators and investors within the UK space industry and its supply chain.

Showcasing an industry worth more than Â£17.5bn to the UK economy, this event will accelerate growth and collaboration across the sector.
All those working in, or who seek opportunities in, the UK space sector are welcome. We especially encourage SMEs in the space sector and businesses from sectors with space-applicable technologies to come along.

Delegate tickets are free of charge and are limited so please only book your place if you can attend in person.
